title: Weekly Digest (22 September, 2019 - 29 September, 2019)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 44 issues were created.
Of these, 12 issues have been closed and 32 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #9065 [upgrade Go: 1.11 > 1.12](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9065), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #9064 [Pair code and PUK code in status should be hidden](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9064), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #9063 [Add currency conversions for signing sheet - Fixes #8027](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9063), by [acolytec3](https://github.com/acolytec3)
:green_heart: #9062 [Can recover account with seedphrase created with keycard](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9062), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #9061 [Account balance is not fetched when multiaccount is created with keycard](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9061), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9060 [Update issue templates](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9060), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #9059 [Add warning message at the last PUK-code attempt](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9059), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9058 [Separate status-react issue templates into bug & feature](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9058), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #9057 [Nothing happens when holding keykard right back agains after error](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9057), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9056 [upgrade status-go with geth 1.9.5](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9056), by [adambabik](https://github.com/adambabik)
:green_heart: #9055 [Can't restore keycard account or pair card ("Cannot retrieve a valid key for a given account" error)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9055), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9054 [Update Onboarding to include illustrations](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9054), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #9053 [keycard bugfixes](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9053), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:green_heart: #9052 [[#9025] fix keycard pairings persistence](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9052), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:green_heart: #9051 [[#9034] Turn off autosuggestion on seedphrase confirmation input](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9051), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9050 [Only allow BIP39 seedphrase](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9050), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #9048 [Remove UUID related code](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9048), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9046 [Can't type ENS name in "New chat" screen (when start typing "0X04" appears)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9046), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9045 [Use images the right way](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9045), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #9044 [Load big .js files in native part](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9044), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #9043 [Verify reagent/react-native rendering assumptions](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9043), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #9039 [Implement network fee slider & custom setting](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9039), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #9038 [build multiple APKs for different architectures](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9038), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #9037 [Error states for new Tx overview: contract & network fees](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9037), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #9035 [Platform check is being made at runtime instead of compile-time](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9035), by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:green_heart: #9034 [Turn off autosuggestion on seedphrase confirmation input](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9034), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #9033 [biometric](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9033), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9028 [Crash at attempt to use second multiaccount with keycard](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9028), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9025 [Can't proceed with creating account if cancel process on "Confirm seed phrase"](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9025), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9024 [Obtain access to the contacts profile picture via the Status DApp API](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9024), by [richard-ramos](https://github.com/richard-ramos)
:green_heart: #9023 [Redirect to blank Unlock screen if tap "Cancel" during onboarding flow](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9023), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9022 [wip images](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9022), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
## CLOSED ISSUES
:heart: #9049 [Fixed multipleaccount test](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9049), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #9047 [Another fix for false failures](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9047), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #9042 [replace require-macro for defnstyle and defstyle](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9042), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #9041 [Hide Account Export menu item in wallet for v1](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9041), by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:heart: #9040 [Hide 'export account' option for v1](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9040), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:heart: #9036 [Small test for mobile sync popup](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9036), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #9032 [throw errors on dangerous behaviours](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9032), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #9031 [hotfix styles.cljs](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9031), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #9030 [Update logcat tests and disable upgrade-app test](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9030), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #9029 [remove wrap-first-time](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9029), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #9027 [[Snyk] Fix for 2 vulnerabilities](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9027), by [snyk-bot](https://github.com/snyk-bot)
:heart: #9026 [[#8516] Cannot delete dapp from "Recent"](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9026), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
## LIKED ISSUE
:+1: #9050 [Only allow BIP39 seedphrase](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9050), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
It received :+1: x2, :smile: x0, :tada: x0 and :heart: x1.
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #9033 [biometric](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9033), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
It received 41 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 34 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
## UPDATED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 14 pull requests were updated.
:yellow_heart: #9065 [upgrade Go: 1.11 > 1.12](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9065), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:yellow_heart: #9060 [Update issue templates](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9060), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:yellow_heart: #9056 [upgrade status-go with geth 1.9.5](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9056), by [adambabik](https://github.com/adambabik)
:yellow_heart: #9053 [keycard bugfixes](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9053), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:yellow_heart: #9052 [[#9025] fix keycard pairings persistence](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9052), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:yellow_heart: #9051 [[#9034] Turn off autosuggestion on seedphrase confirmation input](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9051), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #9038 [build multiple APKs for different architectures](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9038), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:yellow_heart: #9033 [biometric](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9033), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #9022 [wip images](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9022), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #9009 [Network fee error changed from tooltip to red text](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9009), by [igormuba](https://github.com/igormuba)
:yellow_heart: #8985 [Fix sticker pack installation buttons](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8985), by [igetgames](https://github.com/igetgames)
:yellow_heart: #8959 [Fix small UI problems with the compose reply screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8959), by [alexjg](https://github.com/alexjg)
:yellow_heart: #8903 [Onboarding ui touchups](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8903), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:yellow_heart: #8630 [[WIP] Desktop two-pane UI with react-navigation v3](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8630), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
## MERGED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 20 pull requests were merged.
:purple_heart: #9049 [Fixed multipleaccount test](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9049), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:purple_heart: #9047 [Another fix for false failures](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9047), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:purple_heart: #9042 [replace require-macro for defnstyle and defstyle](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9042), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #9041 [Hide Account Export menu item in wallet for v1](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9041), by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:purple_heart: #9036 [Small test for mobile sync popup](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9036), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:purple_heart: #9032 [throw errors on dangerous behaviours](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9032), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #9031 [hotfix styles.cljs](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9031), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #9030 [Update logcat tests and disable upgrade-app test](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9030), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:purple_heart: #9029 [remove wrap-first-time](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9029), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #9026 [[#8516] Cannot delete dapp from "Recent"](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9026), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #9021 [Use modern build system for iOS](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9021), by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:purple_heart: #9020 [Fix app version and deeplink tests](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9020), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:purple_heart: #9016 [typos in REVIEW.md](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9016), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #9014 [fix #8992 update account timestamp when login with keycard](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9014), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #9013 [Add changes to PR checklist discussed in Istanbul](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9013), by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:purple_heart: #9012 [Bump @react-native-community/netinfo from 4.2.1 to 4.2.2 in /mobile/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9012), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:purple_heart: #9011 [Bump qrcode from 1.4.1 to 1.4.2 in /mobile/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9011), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:purple_heart: #9010 [Bump qrcode from 1.4.1 to 1.4.2 in /desktop/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9010), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:purple_heart: #9006 [Use identicon / gfycat from status-go](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9006), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:purple_heart: #9005 [[#8968] custom seed phrase popover](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9005), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)

 - - - 
# COMMITS
Last week there were 22 commits.
:hammer_and_wrench: [Hide Account Export menu item in wallet for v1. Closes #9040  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/f8d447fa59e56ca3c6bdd7f3e03317cb27bb35ac) by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add gfycat/identicon from status-go  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/acd7e56d1d025e25143de5ae492cf3094a00e272) by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Fix multipleaccount test  Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/42a65a7a1eb5221214f11a1c02bca8a4e287326c) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [throw errors on dangerous behaviours  - if multiaccount settings are saved on top of an empty map or nil, this means something went wrong, the state of the app is unstable, and actually saving will result in loss of data. It should never happen, but if it does, throw and error and abort. - sometimes two fxs are merged when they shouldn't, this is caused by bugs and should never happen, but if it does, throw an error with arguments for both effects to help localize the error  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/c047b588edb0cd04205b562b3d52437f4d1b331a) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [replace require-macro for defnstyle and defstyle  - renamed the macros def and defn so that they are now used with aliased namespace `styles/def` and `styles/defn` to force user to use aliased require instead of require-macro and refer - this makes sure the cljs file is required which includes the require for platform ns needed after macroexpension  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/bf6b328996581c77fff437efcbf9d411e00d2ef9) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Another fix for false failures  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/9d0de73c1e65ef5d20991a3bda4fdde797d6dff1) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Mobile popup  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/4239ae56862a73e051ccd8b2f1366825b575d363) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Update logcat tests  Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/0a5acfb0f71c3c08c65930cfa02ce148f247c6ba) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#8968] custom seed phrase popover  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/18ce3b0129e2c90ec31f2dfce6b295b117cdca9c) by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
:hammer_and_wrench: [hotfix styles.cljs  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/3ee52b4fbabfa5574ac5735e07cb3b7a06c6ad13) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [remove wrap-first-time  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/133800b191377bf1fc8a7971c3fe4d3187bf7795) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Modified e2e for deleting-clear all dapps  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/ebc2ff04cd9d27269729e3208b1fdeac46bd2cb3) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#8516] Cannot delete dapp from "Recent"](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/222c6ac20c194fd1085d136993addc8450b2ed8d) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix #8992 update account timestamp when login with keycard  Logout from keycard account was redirecting to login screen for another user because `b.multiaccountsDB.UpdateAccountTimestamp` was not called in `startNodeWithKey` as it was done in `startNodeWithAccount` in status-go  The fix is therefore in status-go and this PR updates status-go version to fix that  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/e91375a97b572c01c43819cf8fa1a437172d3f96) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Bump qrcode from 1.4.1 to 1.4.2 in /mobile/js_files  Bumps [qrcode](https://github.com/soldair/node-qrcode) from 1.4.1 to 1.4.2. - [Release notes](https://github.com/soldair/node-qrcode/releases) - [Changelog](https://github.com/soldair/node-qrcode/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md) - [Commits](https://github.com/soldair/node-qrcode/compare/v1.4.1...v1.4.2)  Signed-off-by: dependabot-preview[bot] <support@dependabot.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/9954ee6b8d66b6a62f8483f296b8410b5a9fd863) by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Bump qrcode from 1.4.1 to 1.4.2 in /desktop/js_files  Bumps [qrcode](https://github.com/soldair/node-qrcode) from 1.4.1 to 1.4.2. - [Release notes](https://github.com/soldair/node-qrcode/releases) - [Changelog](https://github.com/soldair/node-qrcode/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md) - [Commits](https://github.com/soldair/node-qrcode/compare/v1.4.1...v1.4.2)  Signed-off-by: dependabot-preview[bot] <support@dependabot.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/a5a7f3f055ed7e4a4ecdb0d0ed2c99dfc517833e) by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Bump @react-native-community/netinfo in /mobile/js_filesBumps [@react-native-community/netinfo](https://github.com/react-native-community/react-native-netinfo) from 4.2.1 to 4.2.2.- [Release notes](https://github.com/react-native-community/react-native-netinfo/releases)- [Changelog](https://github.com/react-native-community/react-native-netinfo/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)- [Commits](https://github.com/react-native-community/react-native-netinfo/compare/v4.2.1...v4.2.2)Signed-off-by: dependabot-preview[bot] <support@dependabot.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/e6b6deeb04752c01e015eea78182e1bef4893242) by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Fix app version and deeplink tests  Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/2c56de08723c9a5663c895911a41628ba4209a8a) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add changes to PR checklist discussed in Istanbul  Signed-off-by: Pedro Pombeiro <pombeirp@users.noreply.github.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/4a95b88e36584b389926f1c413fc307de6502bc6) by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:hammer_and_wrench: [typos in REVIEW.md  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/a1735e4577e1f3bd5a6911471672bb6da915ca45) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [nix: Update fastlane Gemset  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/97e9f0daa1da5f7b94382cb50151122b6a85f796) by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Use modern build system for iOS](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/51dd7af5f8108fe41651f0b173fafca69c34529b) by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
